channel.title: math.GM updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GM updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A semifield of order 128 and fractional dimension $\frac{7}{3}$ relative to one of its subsemifields
item.description: arXiv:2504.03033v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this short note, an example of a semifield of order 128 containing the Galois field $\mathbb{F}_8$ is given. Up to our knowledge, this is the first example supporting the following problem by Cordero and Chen (2013): ``There exist semifield planes of order $2^t$, for any integers $t$ relatively prime to 3 that admit semifield subplanes of order $2^3$''.
item.dc:creator: Ignacio Fern\'andez R\'ua, El\'ias Fern\'andez-Combarro \'Alvarez
